name: my favourite place
description:
Controls:

A/D or Left/Right -- move

W or Up or Space -- jump

Click -- dash

S or Down -- fall

P -- toggle crt filter

0 -- mute

+/- -- change volume

Made with:

- HaxeFlixel

- Ableton Live

- Aseprite

- LDtk

Used a modified version of Beeblerox's crt shader

Two fonts:

- https://www.dafont.com/000webfont.font

- https://www.dafont.com/english-towne.font

Audio Samples:

- Defelozedd94

- Rhythm Lab (Dmitry Vasilyev)

Secret menu options:

Shift + R + T to reset save

Shift + H to launch "Hardcore Mode"

If you would like to see how your times compare to others, check it out on newgrounds
